name: Folkloric Excursion
description:
In this adventure game, you need your math skills to survive and protect the tourists. Don't let the forest creatures get near them!
Folkloric Excursion let you practice the basic four operations while you gather information about brazilian folklore's creatures. Try to survive longer and to provide a great excursion for all excursionists that are traveling in this journey with you.

  • Solve operations and acquire a lot of points!

  • Defeat enemies to gather informations to fill the bestiary!

  • Pick up coins to buy skins in the shop!

  • Level up to be able to use powerful skills against your enemies!

  • Be careful, enemies are more dangerous at night!

  • Reach the top of the leaderboard!
